text: @NYGovCuomo I think you need to go back on national tv, a few times a week to TRY & kees these RED STATES in check! if NOT, not only our country will suffer, but the entire fucking world. The #COVID19 doesn't care!!! These @gop states deny SCIENCE & DATA! Remind them to be #NewYorkTough
